content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Email recovery for deleted emails in Cloud Email Gateway Protection September 18, 2024—Cloud Email Gateway Protection provides Email Recovery to retain emails marked for deletion for 14 days. This allows for restoration of emails that were mistakenly deleted before they are permanently purged, which helps ensure your business continuity and reduce the risk of data loss.
